message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I believe I can't afford $14,000. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. While $12,000 is a bit out of my budget, I am willing to go up to $11,000 for the product. Could we meet at this price?
